```{r}
JL_allInfo %>%
  filter(
    is.na(sacDateOff),
    is.na(Sac_date),
    DOB >= as.Date("2022-01-01"),
    cycleID >= 44 & cycleID <=71
  ) %>%
   unite(
    comboTrt,
    adultTrt,
    perfusionHr,
    sep = "-",
    remove = FALSE
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    comboTrt = factor(comboTrt, levels = c("CON-2.5", "ALPS-2.5", "CON-5", "ALPS-5"))
  ) %>%
  createRemainingPPT(
    cyclesDF = JL_cycles,
    addToName = "JL"
  )
```

```{r}
df <- JL_allInfo %>%
  filter(
    DOB >= as.Date("2022-01-01"),
    cycleID >= 44 & cycleID <=71
  ) %>%
  select(
    mouseID,
    damID,
    adultTrt,
    perfusionHr,
    UterineDescription
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    hitPro = NA
  ) %>%
  arrange(
    mouseID
  )

saveDFsToExcel(
  "AG_JL_CRH-cre_L10a_mice_trt",
  "df" = df,
  prefix = NULL
)
```
